WorkItem.Description:
The Excel2003XML reader class handles merged cells incorrectly when a row contains multiple merged cells. It does not increment the column counter correctly, so the subsequent merged cells have the wrong column ID.

I have attached a fix for this bug. (with comment "bugfix")
WorkItem.Summary: Bug in Excel2003XML reader, parsing merged cells

Comments.Message: Please note that the source code for PHPExcel has been maintained on github (https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPExcel) for over two years now, and we do accept pull requests
